that is the issue, how is a champ allowed to have both those stats. i mean, dont allow armour/ magic pen to actually reduce stuff to do true damage. the crits + her passive, plus her true damage that even tanks with 3k+ hp get 3 hit by her. the fact that her build is currently ie into shiv etc. it isnt the build that makes her broken its her entire interaction with those items that makes her unhealthy to paly against

Most of the insane burst damage from the new vayne comes from her buffed Q. The Q counts as an auto and multiplies with crit, if they made it like Ezreal/ Nasus, as in the tumble can't crit but just adds flat damage on her auto, I think she would be decently balanced. Right now though, you may as well just flex queue and ban her. Fizz, and Rengar, are also both problems. I think I have the most problem with the latter two to be honest. They took Fizz' hidden power on his W and turned it into burst, giving him that plus an almost unavoidable ultimate and insane utility on his E, it's really unhealthy for the game. Just the fact that Rengar has such high base stats along with insane bonus AD on his passive and a 30 second ult level 16... Jesus. He's just overloaded right now. 

TLDR; Make Vayne's tumble additive damage like Nasus' Q, give Fizz more counterplay MECHANICS (apart from pushing him into turret early, because doing that in solo queue is suicide), and nerf Rengar's scaling, passive, or base AD, and reduce the time he has in ult.

Agree. As a Vayne player myself, the issues i find are..
Getting ganked pre 6 by enemy jungler, if you face a vayne, get JG to camp her, zone her off farm, poke her immensely and make her back.
The stealth is only 1 second so she isnt going far.. Focus her in team fights ALWAYS and CC lock her to the ground. If she tumbles forward into the fight, jump on her.
You can still have assassins who easily 1 shot her too.. new Rengar to name one! 
Theres a reason why you dont see her at worlds or LCS, so therefore she aint that broken!
Vayne is a high skill based champion early game and majority of the rest, in higher elo's you must be able to perform well and come out on top of your enemy.
